Name: Tyler Tactics
About the game: The world is in crisis! A woman is enjoying a slice of pizza. A man is marrying the person he loves. A child has set up a lemonade stand across the street! The problem? All of it pisses you off! Take control of Tyler Tactics in this highly-replayable, action-arcade comedy game. Outsmart your foes with hundreds of unique tactics and bring them to political, financial, and emotional ruin! Lie to the public, steal candy from a baby, unleash the power of the universe itself! Nothing is off limits in this absurd comedy adventure from Bomb Sequitur Games! Features 7 hilarious levels 6 unique minigames 386 unique tactics, supers, and fails! 8 Hand drawn cutscenes 12 original songs 3 difficulties for increased replayability Over 25,000 words
